version_description:
Shaped has become even better due to our new features! Get your unique and conspicuous logo in a few taps. In this update:

- Compose your photos with ease! Snapping gridlines help you align and center objects for the just-right arrangement.
- Add photos to your logo background using pics from thousands available in the app.

We appreciate your continued support! Don’t hesitate to share your feedback via support@apalon.com. We’re always here to help.
